comments:
[N20050608-0010]

In a non-trivial expression, I manually replaced a numeric value by a constant
name and tried to apply the quick fix for creating a constant. An error dialog
popped up with this message:

"An exception occurred while applying the quick fix. Reason:
org.eclipse.jface.text.BadLocationException"

Two entries in my log file:
